headline: A Fresh Look at Schlumberger (NYSE:SLB) Valuation Following Major Petrobras Deepwater Contract Win
summary: Schlumberger (NYSE:SLB) just landed a major contract with Petrobras to provide advanced completion technologies and digital solutions for up to 35 ultra-deepwater wells in Brazil's Santos Basin. This reflects the company's ongoing traction in deepwater projects. See our latest analysis for Schlumberger. Schlumberger has stayed in the headlines with a string of notable developments, including plans to acquire RESMAN Energy Technology and leadership appearances at major industry conferences...

headline: Petrobras Awards Schlumberger Limited (SLB) a Contract to Supply Technology and Completion Services
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the 12 Best Widow and Orphan Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 25, 2025, Petrobras awarded Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB), operating under the SLB brand, a contract to supply technology and completion services for up to 35 ultra-deepwater wells in Brazil’s Santos Basin. These wells, located beneath salt […]
